get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists activations within an Azure subscription.
Lists campaigns within an Azure subscription.
Lists Catalogs within an Azure subscription.
Lists Instances resources within an Azure subscription.
Lists Solutions resources within an Azure subscription.
Lists Targets resources within an Azure subscription.
Returns a collection of activations within the resource group.
Returns the details of the activation.

put.description: Creates a new or updates an existing activation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ActivationListResult.description: The response of a Activation list operation.

value.description: The Activation items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

inputs.description: The inputs of the Activation. Inputs holds a key-value map of user-defined parameters for the initial stage

stage.description: The stage of the campaign from where the Activation should trigger.

campaign.description: The campaign name that the Activation should trigger.

inputs.description: The inputs of the ActivationStatus, Inputs holds a key-value map of user-defined parameters for the initial stage

outputs.description: The outputs of the ActivationStatus, it is different as the different input stages.

status.description: The status code of the ActivationStatus

statusMessage.description: The status message of the ActivationStatus

ActivationTagsUpdate.description: The type used for updating tags in Activation resources.

BindingProperties.description: Defines a binding for a provider.

role.description: Role that the provider binds to with the component.

value.description: The Campaign items on this page

value.description: The CampaignVersion items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

firstStage.description: The initial stage of the CampaignVersion.

selfDriving.description: Whether campaign is self driving or not. That is whether a stage should trigger the next stage when it finishes.
